email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 5000MT of Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th October, and the loading window is 36 hours. The initial freight quote is $45 per metric ton.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. Could you consider lowering the freight to $40 per metric ton?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Michael Johnson
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of $42 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at $10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th October, and the loading window is still 36 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the $42 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Michael Johnson
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 15th October, with a 36-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Michael Johnson
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai - Contract
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. Please find attached the contract for your review. Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
